reviews.review: 100%  honesty this game is fucking amazing its not exactly balanced or competitive but it so satisfying and fun to bunny hop around dust 2 and crackhouse dm and land those juicy AWP noscopes and those ak headshots this game is so much fun if you can get the hang of it and is still my favorite counter strike game hands down.
Overall, one of the best counter strike games, if not the best. Is much more fun than the cesspool that is CSGO.

A timeless classic of an FPS game. I recommend it to everyone.

But please, for the love of all that is holy, keep this game alive. I've been getting depressed seeing the playercount of the game reach the 1,000-2,000 area at max. [b] Don't [/b] buy this only for the textures and models in Garry's Mod, play it and don't leave it in the dust. Purchasing this only for Garry's Mod content is the single, worst reason to get this. I hate to repeat my point, but I have to make myself clear.

Keep Counter Strike: Source alive.

O primeiro contato que eu tive com o Counter-Strike: Source foi quando eu jogava o Counter-Strike 1.6 em um computador extremamente lento que n√£o suportava o Source, ent√£o instalei um mod de texturas e fui feliz. Agora, que eu tenho a oportunidade de jogar ele mesmo, consigo voltar um pouco no tempo para aquela √©poca. Sendo assim, recomendo esse titulo, principalmente, pela nostalgia de poder experiencia-lo novamente.
